content: **knitted jumper in drops melody the piece is worked top down with round yoke and double neck sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ml-078 yarn group d ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 250-300-300-350-350-400 g colour 03 pearl grey needles drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 14 stitches in width and 16 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size -----------------------------------------------------
